typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		UserID as string,
		{Signup Date} as date,
		{User Segment} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourceipfeature
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> vistorsource
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> sourcevisitor
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as timestamp,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		webClientID as string,
		VisitDateTime as date,
		ProductID as string,
		UserID as string,
		Activity as string,
		Browser as string,
		OS as string,
		City as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source3
vistorsource select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		UserID,
		Activity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select
Filter aggregate(groupBy(UserID),
	No_of_days_Visited_7_Days = countDistinct(VisitDateTime),
		Pageloads_last_7_days = sum(case(Activity=="PAGELOAD",1,0)),
		Clicks_last_7_days = sum(case(Activity=="CLICK",1,0))) ~> AggNoofdaysVisited7Days
Select filter(VisitDateTime>toDate("2018-05-20")) ~> Filter
sourcevisitor select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 filter(VisitDateTime>toDate("2018-05-12")) ~> Filter2
Filter2 aggregate(groupBy(UserID),
	No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days = countDistinct(ProductID)) ~> NoOfProductsViewed15Days
sourceipfeature derive(User_Vintage = minus(toDate("2018-05-08"), {Signup Date})) ~> DerivedColumn
source1 select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID,
		Activity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select3
Select3 filter(VisitDateTime>toDate("2018-05-12")&&Activity=="PAGELOAD") ~> Filter3
Filter3 aggregate(groupBy(UserID,
		ProductID),
	countproducts = count(ProductID),
		maxvisitdatatime = max(VisitDateTime)) ~> Aggregate2
source2 select(mapColumn(
		UserID,
		OS,
		Activity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select4
Select4 aggregate(groupBy(UserID,
		OS),
	countOS = count(OS)) ~> Aggregate3
Filter7 select(mapColumn(
		UserID,
		Most_Active_OS = OS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MostActiveOS
Aggregate2 window(over(UserID),
	desc(countproducts, true),
	desc(maxvisitdatatime, true),
	rank = rowNumber()) ~> Window1
Window1 filter(rank==1) ~> Filter4
Filter4 select(mapColumn(
		UserID,
		Most_Viewed_product_15_Days = ProductID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MostViewedproduct15Days
source3 select(mapColumn(
		VisitDateTime,
		ProductID,
		UserID,
		Activity
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select7
Filter5 window(over(UserID),
	desc(VisitDateTime, true),
	ranks = rowNumber()) ~> Window2
Select7 filter(Activity=="PAGELOAD") ~> Filter5
Window2 filter(ranks==1) ~> Filter6
Filter6 select(mapColumn(
		Recently_Viewed_Product = ProductID,
		UserID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RecentlyViewedProduct
DerivedColumn, AggNoofdaysVisited7Days lookup(sourceipfeature@UserID == AggNoofdaysVisited7Days@UserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 select(mapColumn(
		Master_userid = sourceipfeature@UserID,
		User_Vintage,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days,
		Pageloads_last_7_days,
		Clicks_last_7_days
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select9
Select9, NoOfProductsViewed15Days lookup(Master_userid == UserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup2
Lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		Master_userid,
		User_Vintage,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days,
		Pageloads_last_7_days,
		Clicks_last_7_days,
		No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select10
Select10, MostViewedproduct15Days lookup(Master_userid == UserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup3
Lookup3 select(mapColumn(
		Master_userid,
		User_Vintage,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days,
		Pageloads_last_7_days,
		Clicks_last_7_days,
		No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days,
		Most_Viewed_product_15_Days
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select11
Select11, MostActiveOS lookup(Master_userid == UserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup4
Lookup4 select(mapColumn(
		Master_userid,
		User_Vintage,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days,
		Pageloads_last_7_days,
		Clicks_last_7_days,
		No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days,
		Most_Viewed_product_15_Days,
		Most_Active_OS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select12
Select12, RecentlyViewedProduct lookup(Master_userid == UserID,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup5
Lookup5 select(mapColumn(
		UserID = Master_userid,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days,
		No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days,
		User_Vintage,
		Most_Viewed_product_15_Days,
		Most_Active_OS,
		Recently_Viewed_Product,
		Pageloads_last_7_days,
		Clicks_last_7_days
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectReqd
Aggregate3 window(over(UserID),
	desc(countOS, true),
	rownumber = rowNumber()) ~> Window3
Window3 filter(rownumber==1) ~> Filter7
SelectReqd derive(sortUserID = toInteger(trim(UserID,"U")),
		UserID = UserID,
		No_of_days_Visited_7_Days = iif(isNull(No_of_days_Visited_7_Days),0,toInteger(No_of_days_Visited_7_Days)),
		No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days = iif(isNull(No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days),0,toInteger(No_Of_Products_Viewed_15_Days)),
		User_Vintage = User_Vintage,
		Most_Viewed_product_15_Days = iif(isNull(Most_Viewed_product_15_Days),"Product101",Most_Viewed_product_15_Days),
		Most_Active_OS = Most_Active_OS,
		Recently_Viewed_Product = iif(isNull(Recently_Viewed_Product), "Product101",Recently_Viewed_Product),
		Pageloads_last_7_days = iif(isNull(Pageloads_last_7_days),0,toInteger(Pageloads_last_7_days)),
		Clicks_last_7_days = iif(isNull(Clicks_last_7_days),0,toInteger(Clicks_last_7_days))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sort(asc(sortUserID, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['solution.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
